sentence: If the renovation took place it was a while ago and the furniture and bathrooms were not done on the 8th floor
The tub was in dire need of repair or better yet replacement
Makes sense as those are the floors that have been renovated just making a comment as there seem to be a lot of comments on the hallway carpet

It was sufficient for what we needed it for somewhere to get a few hours to rest before driving back to SoCal clean the self checkin is super fast and easy and of course Margaritavile was right downstairsThe rooms were clean had plenty of towels and the beds were redic comfy but though they claim to be newly renovated there was quite a bit of wear on the dresser and the wood covering was peeling off

will update when i remember the namefab atmosphere in there if not looking for a heavy night of clubingWe got charged 2x extra for connecting phones to the wifi which we did nt do but tbh the que for check out was huge that it would have held us up when trying to get to the airportUber picks you up just by the main taxi rank at the back of check in
You will have to refer to our photos to see the absolutely appalling and disgusting neglect of cleaning and maintenance
For only 200 more a night we were upgraded to a newly renovated 4 months ago Go Room
Was hoping for either a newly renovated room or a go room which I have been upgraded to before for free
The fact renovations were going on and was told nothing about it until I figured it out for myself as we entered the room
Noisy because the undergoing renovation
They did a good job with the renovation of our room
I think the key is that you get a renovated room
The renovated rooms are 10x nicer and cleaner than the old rooms
well it like other areas has n’t been updated in some time
Friends had a nice updated room on 10th floor but still no hot water they said
My room seemed newly renovated and clean
Our room was a newly renovated room on the 18th floor
Stayed one night in one of the older un renovated rooms because it was all they had
The remodeled rooms look nice but the bathroom smelled a little moldy
Flamingo renovation flop
Stayed here for night in the newly renovated rooms

Stayed at The Flamingo hotel for 5 days at the flamingo room 22nd floor it was fully renovated so everything looked new the beds were so comfortable and was very clean the only con is that they allow smoking throughout pretty much all around the lobby and most of the hotel areas and also the elevators and it ’s hard to get away from the smoke But other than that the service is great and the non smoking room was perfect
We stayed in a mini suite in the newly remodeled Flamingo rooms
The rooms have been renovated and are nice
Wiliam told us the Go Executive room also was recently remodeled
Thanks to security and maintenance for quick response to our dead battery in or room door
A big and beautiful hotel but I think the restrooms should be renovated
The rooms are nice but they need to be repaired
Love the remodel very great atmosphere and service
The rooms could be updated but the staff and housekeeping were friendly and prompt with solving any issues we had
